::Rex::

Rex stops at a CR chamber, putting BrightBlade inside and activating it. It 
was a CR especially designed for the brig, it's subject would come out in 
temporary stasis, so that they could be easilly disarmed. Rex pushes a few 
buttons, locking the chamber's door.

He walks back to Gangon's cell.

"You need one too?" he asks Gangon, looking hostilly at him.
